## Input.unsubscribe() method

Removes an existing input event subscription.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
unsubscribe(eventName: InputEventKind, fn: (e: LocalPointerEvent) => void): false | ((e: LocalPointerEvent) => void)[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  eventName | <code>InputEventKind</code> | The name of the event (see InputEventKind). |
|  fn | <code>(e: LocalPointerEvent) =&gt; void</code> | The callback function used when subscribing to the event. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`false | ((e: LocalPointerEvent) => void)[]`
